SourceProxy.name: Read GEO EAS File To Table
SourceProxy.label: Read GEO EAS File To Table

IntVectorProperty.name: OutputDataSetType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property determines the dataset type for the output of the programmable filter.

StringVectorProperty.name: Script
StringVectorProperty.default_values:
import numpy as np import csv from vtk.util import numpy_support
pdo = self.GetOutput() # vtkTable
if (Use_tab_delimiter): Delimiter_Field = '\t'
titles = [] data = [] with open(FileName) as f: reader = csv.reader(f, delimiter=Delimiter_Field) # Skip defined lines for i in range(Number_Ignore_Lines): next(f)
# Get file header (part of format) header = next(f) # TODO: do something with the header print('File Header: ' + header) # Get titles numCols = int(next(f)) for i in range(numCols): titles.append(next(f).rstrip('\r\n'))
# Read data for row in reader: data.append(row)
# Put first column into table for i in range(len(titles)): col = [] for row in data: col.append(row[i]) VTK_data = numpy_support.numpy_to_vtk(num_array=col, deep=True, array_type=vtk.VTK_FLOAT) VTK_data.SetName(titles[i]) pdo.AddColumn(VTK_data)
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property contains the text of a python program that the programmable source runs.
